jenkem.shared.color

Class Cube

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenkem.shared.color.Cube

  • public class Cube
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is used to manipulate a Cube made of colors. X, Y, Z ---> Red, Green, Blue http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RGB_color_space http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/03/RGB_farbwuerfel.jpg

        public final Color getTwoNearestColors(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> colorMap,
                        int[] col)
        This method is where everything happens. it's the tongue of jenkem.
        Parameters:
        colorMap - the colormap to use
        col - an array with three RGB values representing the pixel to translate.
        Returns:
        a Color object with info to represent the same color in irc

      • isFirstCloserTo

        public final boolean isFirstCloserTo(int[] first,
                      int[] second,
                      int[] compare)
        Compares two colors to a third and returns true if the first one is closer to the third than the second.
        Parameters:
        first - rgb values of the first color to compare
        second - rgb values of the second color to compare
        compare - rgb values of the color to compare the others to
        Returns:
        boolean that is true if the first color is closer to the comparation
